properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 c2 v2 c1 c2 v3 c1 c2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Pingu za maisha
leo mmeshazifunga. x2
Sasa ilobaki harusi
yenu kuitunza. x2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Muitunze harusi yenu
isije chafuka
harusi yenu isije chafuka.
Muitunze na pete yenu
isije chafuka
na pete yenu isije chafuka.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Muwatunze watoto wenu
wasije chafuka
watoto wenu wasije chafuka
aasa ilobaki,
harusi yenu kuitunza. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Pete ni alama sote
tumeshuhudia. x2
Sasa ilobaki harusi
yenu kuitunza. x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ukifika huko dada
kaa ukijua. x2
Kaa ukijua dunia
ina maneno. x2
